messages.title: Campaigning for a Fairer Society
messages.content: Dr Jenny Woods lives here, in the heart of Reading East. 'Having Liberal Democrats in government has been good for the country and good for our area.'

messages.title: OUR PROMISE OF MORE
messages.content: Lib Dems will increase NHS funding by £8bn per year by 2020, the only party to give the NHS what it has asked for. Lib Dems will cut income tax by another £400, so you pay no tax on your first £12,500 of pay. Lib Dems will protect education funding from nursery to 19, with qualified teachers in every classroom.

messages.title: Only a vote for Dr Jenny Woods can beat the Conservatives here...
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Tories in Reading East! Voting Labour, Green or UKIP will just help the Tories win in our area. A vote for Dr Jenny Woods is a positive vote for Reading East - and for a fairer society and stronger economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gave an income tax cut of more than £800 to the average worker.
Improved health services with 6,000 extra doctors & put £400 million into mental health care.
Provided an extra £2.5bn per year for struggling school kids through the Pupil Premium.
Lib Dems will cut income tax by another £400, so you pay no tax on your first £12,500 of pay.
Lib Dems will increase NHS funding by £8bn per year by 2020, the only party to give the NHS what it has asked for.

mentions.candidate: As your MP, I'll fight for the things we all care about - affordable housing more funding for health good schools for our children better transport and protected green spaces. I'll work to make life better for everyone in Reading East.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Dr Jenny Woods can beat the Conservatives here... Only the Lib Dems can beat the Tories in Reading East! Voting Labour, Green or UKIP will just help the Tories win in our area.

issues.economy: Our income tax cut put more than £800 back in the pockets of working people. 'Liberal Democrats in the next government can make our area even better. We're investing in housing, in the NHS, in education and the environment - working hard to create a strong economy, a fair society and opportunity for everyone.'
issues.education: Our commitment to education supports early years childcare, free school meals and apprenticeships, so young people can get a good start in life.
issues.governance: Jenny, a trained scientist, is renowned nationally as a civil rights campaigner. 'She led the successful Liberal Democrat fight against the Snooper's Charter which would have spied on everyone's private lives and failed to make the country safer. Only a vote for Jenny will protect your privacy and freedom in future.'
issues.health: Improved health services with 6,000 extra doctors & put £400 million into mental health care.
issues.socialWelfare: Our 'triple lock' guarantees pensioners a decent rise in state pension every year.

housing.content: 'Liberal Democrats in the next government can make our area even better. We're investing in housing, in the NHS, in education and the environment - working hard to create a strong economy, a fair society and opportunity for everyone.'

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to build a better future and make sure no-one gets left behind.

quotes.text: Having Liberal Democrats in government has been good for the country and good for our area.

Liberal Democrats in the next government can make our area even better. We're investing in housing, in the NHS, in education and the environment - working hard to create a strong economy, a fair society and opportunity for everyone.
